name: quick-whatsapp-call
description: Quick WhatsCALL is a simple web application that generates a direct link to a WhatsApp chat for a specified phone number. Users can select their country code, enter a valid phone number, and add an optional message. The app validates inputs, formats the WhatsApp link, and opens the chat in a new window, making it easy to start conversations instantly. Built with a minimalist design using Pico CSS for styling.
author: Max Jimenez
